short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cleans up gfycat, removing everything but the gif itself when a gfycat page is viewed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whenever a page is viewed on gfycat, this addon will strip all social and unnecessary features and instead just leave the gif for viewing. Useful if your only use for the site is to view files sent by someone else or linked from another site or app.
